output:
Every time I whisper
I always feel you once more
Can I be there with you, sleeping around?
Each time I remember
My thoughts fall out in this world
It's like a night sky without stars
I hardly keep memory of you and I
Every precious thing fades away
We met again this hot summer
Slowly you open your eyes to me
So much is there but I almost let it
I wanna feel again this sweet happiness
